inclusion.criterion: Male and female subjects >6 months to <6 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with significant pulmonary disease including asthma
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: The use of any investigational drug within 30 days prior to Visit 1
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of asthma, but symptoms are controlled with medication. Patient is willing and able to comply with study requirements.
